verse.name: v1
verse.lines: While shepherds watched their flocks by night, newline All seated on the ground, newline The angel of the Lord came down, newline And glory shone around.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: "Be not afraid," the angel said, newline For fear had seized their mind; newline "Glad tidings of great joy I bring newline To you and all mankind.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: "To you, in David's town town this day newline Is born of David's line newline A Savior, who is Christ the Lord; newline And this shall be the sign:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: "The heavenly Babe you there shall find newline To human view displayed, newline In simple clothing, tightly wrapped, newline And in a manger laid."

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Thus spoke the seraph, and at once newline Appeared a shining throng newline Of angels praising God, who thus newline Addressed their joyful song:

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: "All glory be to God on high newline And on the earth be peace; newline Good will hence forth from heaven to men newline Begin and never cease."
